page.title: 14LANGUAGE
page.content: THE MAIN LANGUAGE SPOKEN IN NORTHFIELD I ENGLISH,THOUGH THERE ARE A NUMBER OF FAMILIES WHO HAVE COME INTO THE AREA FROM COUNTRIES SUCH AS IRAQ,PAKISTAN, JAMAICA,EGYPT,MALAYSIA,CHINA,FRANCE, SOUTH AMERICA,GERMANY ETC. BRINGING THEIR OWN LANGUAGE WITH THEM. IT MUST BE EMPHASISED THAT THESE AREC USUALLY INDIVIDUAL FAMILIES AND DO NOT FORM A LARGE PART OF THE COMMUNITY.IN SOME PARTS THE BIRMINGHAM ACCENT IS MORE PRO NOUNCED THAN IN OTHER PARTS,ALSO SLANG IS MORE FREQUENTLY USED IN SOME PARTS THAN OTHERS. HERE ARE A FEW EXAMPLES OF LOCAL SPEECH TWENTY-TWENNY FORTY-FORREY SOMETHING-SOMETHINK NOTHING-NOTHINK.
